name: Barrowdale Village Plaza: Demo
description:
Barrowdale Village Plaza demo game made in RPG maker. 

Enjoy, there's not much, this was more my experiment for actually learning how to use RPG maker. ^^ I will be making the real deal after this. Please do not take this seriously as I made this in a day LOL.

All dialogue, no combat. Used this to test out dialogue trees, switches, events, making cutscenes, doors, etc. This was a fun project and now I feel like I am ready to take on a bigger game! I'm going to try to make this story stick as close as I can with my comic I am also writing (unrealeased lol)

if you leave a nice comment, i will probably cry. i will be very happy. thank you for playing my demo game.
